languages.text: В колонии высадились хорошо вооруженные люди, принявшиеся грабить и распоряжаться, словно они здесь власть. Судя по докладам, эти похожие на пиратов головорезы — вольные каперы из тех, что во множестве окружают Каллигоса Винтерскейла и ищут его милости.

A troop of well-armed people has landed in the colony and started plundering, acting like they are in charge. The reports suggest that these pirating cutthroats are privateers, the likes of whom flock toward the banner of Calligos Winterscale, seeking his favour.
languages.original_text: В колонии высадились хорошо вооруженные люди, принявшиеся грабить и распоряжаться, словно они здесь власть. Судя по докладам, эти похожие на пиратов головорезы — вольные каперы из тех, что во множестве окружают Каллигоса Винтерскейла и ищут его милости.

traits.locale_text: A troop of well-armed people has landed in the colony and started plundering and acting like they are in charge. The reports suggest that these pirating cutthroats are privateers of the kind that swarm around Calligos Winterscale seeking his favour.

A troop of well-armed people has landed in the colony and started plundering, acting like they are in charge. The reports suggest that these pirating cutthroats are privateers, the likes of whom flock toward the banner of Calligos Winterscale, seeking his favour.

languages.text: Una tropa bien armada ha aterrizado en la colonia y la está saqueando como si fueran los amos del local. Según los informes, estos piratas son corsarios como los que suelen acudir a buscar el favor de Calligos Winterscale.
languages.original_text: A troop of well-armed people has landed in the colony and started plundering, acting like they are in charge. The reports suggest that these pirating cutthroats are privateers, the likes of whom flock toward the banner of Calligos Winterscale, seeking his favour.

traits.locale_text: Una tropa bien armada ha aterrizado en la colonia y la está saqueando como si fueran los amos del local. Según los informes, estos piratas son corsarios como los que suelen acudir a buscar el favor de Calligos Winterscale.

languages.text: Une bande lourdement armée a atterri dans la colonie, s'est livrée à des pillages et croit pouvoir agir en toute impunité. D'après les rapports, ces criminels seraient des corsaires à la solde de Calligos Winterscale et prêts à tout pour s'attirer les faveurs de leur maître.
languages.original_text: A troop of well-armed people has landed in the colony and started plundering, acting like they are in charge. The reports suggest that these pirating cutthroats are privateers, the likes of whom flock toward the banner of Calligos Winterscale, seeking his favour.

traits.locale_text: Une bande lourdement armée a atterri dans la colonie, s'est livrée à des pillages et croit pouvoir agir en toute impunité. D'après les rapports, ces criminels seraient des corsaires à la solde de Calligos Winterscale et prêts à tout pour s'attirer les faveurs de leur maître.

languages.text: 一支装备精良的部队登陆了殖民地，大肆掠夺、作威作福。报告称，这群恶徒都是海盗私掠者，如苍蝇逐臭一样，聚集在卡里戈斯·温特斯凯尔的麾下。
languages.original_text: A troop of well-armed people has landed in the colony and started plundering, acting like they are in charge. The reports suggest that these pirating cutthroats are privateers, the likes of whom flock toward the banner of Calligos Winterscale, seeking his favour.

traits.locale_text: 一支装备精良的部队登陆了殖民地，大肆掠夺、作威作福。报告称，这群恶徒都是海盗私掠者，如苍蝇逐臭一样，聚集在卡里戈斯·温特斯凯尔的麾下。

languages.text: 武装した一団がコロニーに上陸し、まるで自分たちが支配者であるかのように振る舞って略奪を始めた。報告によると、この海賊たちは私掠船で、カリゴス・ウィンタースケールの旗のもとに集まり、彼の寵愛を受けようとしているようだ。
languages.original_text: A troop of well-armed people has landed in the colony and started plundering, acting like they are in charge. The reports suggest that these pirating cutthroats are privateers, the likes of whom flock toward the banner of Calligos Winterscale, seeking his favour.

traits.locale_text: 武装した一団がコロニーに上陸し、まるで自分たちが支配者であるかのように振る舞って略奪を始めた。報告によると、この海賊たちは私掠船で、カリゴス・ウィンタースケールの旗のもとに集まり、彼の寵愛を受けようとしているようだ。

languages.text: Eine gut bewaffnete Truppe ist in der Kolonie gelandet und hat mit Plünderungen begonnen. Sie führen sich auf, als würde alles ihnen gehören. Den Berichten zufolge sind diese mörderischen Piraten Freibeuter, wie sie sich unter dem Banner von Calligos Winterzunder versammeln und um dessen Gunst buhlen.
languages.original_text: A troop of well-armed people has landed in the colony and started plundering, acting like they are in charge. The reports suggest that these pirating cutthroats are privateers, the likes of whom flock toward the banner of Calligos Winterscale, seeking his favour.

traits.locale_text: Eine gut bewaffnete Truppe ist in der Kolonie gelandet und hat mit Plünderungen begonnen. Sie führen sich auf, als würde alles ihnen gehören. Den Berichten zufolge sind diese mörderischen Piraten Freibeuter, wie sie sich unter dem Banner von Calligos Winterzunder versammeln und um dessen Gunst buhlen.

languages.text: Koloniye iniş yapan teçhizatlı birlik, idare ellerindeymiş gibi bölgeyi yağmalamaya başlamış. Bildirilere göre akranları Calligos Winterscale'in sancağı altında toplanıp hanedan liderinin gözüne girmeye çalışan bu boğazkesenler, izinli korsanlık yapıyormuş.
languages.original_text: A troop of well-armed people has landed in the colony and started plundering, acting like they are in charge. The reports suggest that these pirating cutthroats are privateers, the likes of whom flock toward the banner of Calligos Winterscale, seeking his favour.
